content.text: Class 10 Science Exam Analysis 2026: Today's Paper Review

The Class 10 Science board paper held on February 25, 2026, was a balanced mix of direct theory and application-based questions. While Physics numericals were slightly tricky, Biology and Chemistry sections were largely based on NCERT examples. Our experts have analyzed Set-1, Set-2, and Set-3 to provide the most accurate answer key.

content.question: Was the Science 2026 paper hard?
